panels.content:
- [Ansible playbooks](https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/gl-infra/db-migration/-/tree/master/pg-physical-to-logical)
- [Inventory in Ansible](https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/gl-infra/db-migration/-/tree/master/pg-physical-to-logical/inventory)
- [CR template](https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/gl-infra/db-migration/-/blob/master/.gitlab/issue_templates/decomposition.md) (individual CRs are to be located at ops.gitlab.net)
- [Diagram illustrating the process](https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/gl-infra/db-migration/-/blob/master/.gitlab/issue_templates/decomposition.md#high-level-overview)
